name: UIBarButtonItemStateAppearance
desc: A data object containing the specific customizations for a bar button item in a particular state.

items.name: var titleTextAttributes: [NSAttributedString.Key : Any]
items.desc: String attributes to apply to the text of the bar button item's title.

items.name: var titlePositionAdjustment: UIOffset
items.desc: The additional amount by which to offset the title horizontally and vertically.

items.name: var backgroundImage: UIImage?
items.desc: A background image to display around the button

items.name: var backgroundImagePositionAdjustment: UIOffset
items.desc: The distance, in points, by which to offset the background image horizontally and vertically.
